About Me

Sammy Ajayi

Akure, Nigeria

I am an allround web developer. I am a developer with a good knowledge of front and back end techniques. I love making sleek and responsive and fast user friendly websites and robust web applications

Web Design

My approach to web design is to create a website that strenghtens your company's brand and promote your business while ensuring ease of use and simplicity for your audience

Responsive Design

Having a responsive layout means that your website fluidly resizes for optimal viewing, regardless of the screen or device.
